valueString.value: Conditions and findings indicating drug abuse.

valueMarkdown.value: Note that the terminologies included in this implementation guide will need to be updated, because the ideal mechanism for distribution (as an expression) is not currently supported by the content logical definition constructs available in the FHIR ValueSet resource and all known implementations of it. Before use in a production environment, ensure you have the latest value sets based on the definitions for each value set (as defined in the inclusion/exclusion criteria for each one).

title.value: ICD9, ICD10 and Snomed Drug Abuse Conditions

publisher.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

description.value: ValueSet containing all diagnosis and findings indicating drug abuse codes.

display.value: Clinical Focus

text.value: Diagnosis and findings indicating drug abuse.

display.value: United States of America

purpose.value: Provide terminology to determine whether patient has drug abuse conditions in recommendation 8.

valueString.value: FROM [^SNOMED CT US Edition^] with (CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Drug dependence (disorder)[SNOMED CT US Edition]" OR CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Finding relating to drug misuse behavior (finding)[SNOMED CT US Edition]" OR CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Substance abuse (disorder)[SNOMED CT US Edition]" OR CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Current drug user (finding)[SNOMED CT US Edition]" OR CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Drug seeking behavior (finding)[SNOMED CT US Edition]" OR CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Drug-related offending behavior (finding)[SNOMED CT US Edition]" OR CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Injecting drug user (finding)[SNOMED CT US Edition]" OR CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Has a routine of drug-related activities (finding)[SNOMED CT US Edition]" OR CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Misuse of prescription only drugs (finding)[SNOMED CT US Edition]" OR CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Misuses drugs (finding)[SNOMED CT US Edition]") AND_NOT (CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Nicotine dependence (disorder)[SNOMED CT US Edition]") EXPORT Concept_Name, ^Code in Source[SNOMED CT US Edition]^,^Parent^; FROM [^ICD-10-CM^] with (CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "[Z71.4] Alcohol abuse counseling and surveillance[ICD-10-CM]" OR CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "[Z71.5] Drug abuse counseling and surveillance[ICD-10-CM]" OR CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "[F55] Abuse of non-psychoactive substances[ICD-10-CM]" OR CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "[F10-F19] Mental and behavioral disorders due to psychoactive substance use (F10-F19)[ICD-10-CM]") AND_NOT (CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "[F17] Nicotine dependence[ICD-10-CM]") EXPORT Concept_Name, ^Code in Source[ICD-10-CM]^,^Parent^; FROM [^ICD-9-CM^] with (CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Alcohol dependence syndrome [303][ICD-9-CM]" OR CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Drug dependence [304][ICD-9-CM]" OR CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Nondependent abuse of drugs [305][ICD-9-CM]") AND_NOT (CONCEPT DESCENDANT_OF_PLUS "Tobacco use disorder [305.1][ICD-9-CM]") EXPORT Concept_Name, ^Code in Source[ICD-9-CM]^, ^Parent^;
